Class LayoutHandlerBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.conqat.lib.simulink.model.datahandler.LayoutHandlerBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimulinkLayoutHandler, StateflowLayoutHandler

    public abstract class LayoutHandlerBase
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for layout handlers.
